name: Java API for Creative Commons licenses
short_description:
CCRDFJavaLib is a Java API designed to facilitate the reading, writing,
and manipulation of Creative Commons license RDF metadata.  Creative 
Commons is a "nonprofit that offers a flexible copyright for creative 
work."
